## isStringLike() function

判断是否是数字或字符串，不包括NaN和infinity。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isStringLike(target: any): target is string | number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | any |  |

**Returns:**

target is string \| number
